Description: Terracotta reclining ithyphallic figure of Harpocrates. A youth, modelled in the round, reclining on a low plinth, his legs extending to his right. He is naked and has a shaved head and large sidelock. His right hand is placed on the root of his huge phallus, which doubles back on itself behind him, with the glans curving forward to act as a prop for his left elbow, his left hand supporting his head. Solid; two-piece mould. Micaceous brown Nile silt, the mica particles small. Traces of a white dressing bearing areas of red paint.
Curator's comments: A number of similar pieces from Naukratis of this type (Oxford, Ashmolean Museum AN1896-1908-E.3719; British Museum GR1973, 0501.19, GR1973,0501.20, GR1973,0501.36) and parallels strangling a goose (British Museum GR1973,0501.24, Brussels, Musées Royaux d’Art et d’Histoire A.1833) have been found. Similar unprovenanced parallels are dated end of fourth, beginning of third century BC (Fischer 1994, no. 19) and are known from Ptolemaic Memphis (Petrie Museum UC48467, UC48376). Similar reclining Harpocrates figures were made of faience, found in a third century BC context at Athribis (Szymańska 1999b, 73, fig. 2) and also found at Naukratis (British museum GR1886,0401.1495) and Karnak (Masson pers. com). Comparanda in the British Museum (Bailey 2008, no.3212), Ashmolean Museum, Oxford (no. 1966.1081) and in Berlin (Weber 1914; 71, fig. 41). Near, but in faience (Sotheby’s New York Sale Catalogue, 18 June 1991, lots 25 and 45; June 1992, lot 246, both described as Harpokrates). Bailey, D.M. 2008, Catalogue of Egyptian Terracottas in the British Museum, IV, London. Fischer, J. 1994, Griechisch-römische Terrakotten aus Ägypten. Die Sammlungen Sieglin und Schreiber, Dresden, Leipzig, Stuttgart, Tübingen, Tübinger Studien zur Archäologie und Kunstgeschichte 14, Tübingen. Szymańska, H. 1999, in Grimal, N. (ed.) Tell-Edfou, soixante ans après, Actes du colloque franco- polonais, Le Caire, 15 octobre 1996, Cairo. Weber, W. 1914, Die ägyptisch-griechischen Terrakotten. Königliche Museen zu Berlin, Mitteilungen aus der Ägyptischen Sammlung II., Berlin.
Bibliographic references: Terracotta / Catalogue of Terracottas in the British Museum (3217)
